title: Chapter 3126: Inside The Great Formation
body:
Chapter 3126: Inside The Great Formation

Chapter 3126: Inside the great formation

Buzzzzzz!

A ripple appeared in the air, and then a figure appeared in the sky.

The nine absolutes Heavenly King had arrived.

The nine absolute Heavenly King stood in the sky, not moving at all, and waited quietly.

Not long after, from another direction, a rainbow light flew over.

The people from the nine blades Heavenly King mansion had arrived.

The leader of the group was the nine blade Heavenly King.

Behind him, other than the two old men, the rest were all young people.

There were more than a hundred young people, each of them with an imposing appearance, all of them were Dragons among men.

“Nine blades, everyone’s here, let’s begin!”

Heavenly King Nine cuts looked at Heavenly King Nine sabers.

“Just what I wanted!”

The nine blade Heavenly King smiled faintly, then waved his hand. Suddenly, dense runes appeared on the empty space in front of him.

These runes formed a large formation that enveloped a large area of open space.

This open space was very wide, including mountains and lakes. There were all kinds of terrains.

This was the great formation that Heavenly King Nine blades had set up in the past seven days.

After the formation appeared, the nine saber Heavenly King waved his hand again, and a huge Tiger appeared in the sky.

This ferocious Tiger was not a living being of flesh and blood, but a puppet.

“First level God King!”

&Nbsp; many people were moved. They could sense that the Tiger puppet’s aura was equivalent to that of a first level Godking.

After taking out the Tiger puppet, the divine power Pearl appeared in Godking ninedawes ‘hand.

When they saw the divine power origin bead, countless people’s eyes burned with desire.

Nine blades Heavenly King waved his hand, and the divine power source Pearl flew out, flying towards the spot between the Tiger puppet’s eyebrows, and then embedded itself there.

Roar!

The ferocious Tiger puppet let out a roar and stepped into the air. Its body turned into a stream of light and flew towards the formation, disappearing within it.

“You guys, look …”

When the Tiger puppet disappeared into the formation, the nine blades Heavenly King mansion waved again, and a huge picture appeared in the sky.

In this image, one could clearly see the ferocious Tiger puppet from earlier running quickly through a forest.

this image can project the situation inside the formation. We can see what you’re doing inside. In a moment, you will enter the formation and chase after the puppet. Whoever takes the divine power origin bead and stays in the formation for a month will have the divine power origin bead.

The nine saber Heavenly King announced, then looked at the nine absolute Heavenly King,””Jiujue, what do you think? you don’t have any objections, right?”

“No, I didn’t!”

Heavenly King Nine cuts said calmly.

“Alright, let’s begin!”

Heavenly King Nine sabers ‘voice reverberated throughout the entire scene.

“Let’s go ~”

As soon as the nine blades Heavenly King mansion’s voice fell, a young man rose into the air and rushed in the direction of the formation.

Buzzzzzz! &Nbsp; Whoosh!…

Several hundred figures flew toward the array.

These people were all geniuses of the nine absolute Heavenly King mansion. Some of them were at the first level of the Godking realm, but there were also half-step godkings and even ninth level heavenly gods.

These people were hoping to get lucky.

The formation covered a vast area. If he was lucky and found a divine power Pearl, he could find a place to hide. After a month, the divine power Pearl would be his.

Many people had the same thought.

Hundreds of elites flew into the array’s range and disappeared.

However, the next moment, the huge picture in the sky showed the young man who had entered.

After the young men entered the formation, they scattered and flew in different directions.

Following that, more and more Young heaven’s favorites flew forward.

Some of them were existences with astonishing strength.

However, the paragons of the nine blades Heavenly King mansion did not rush forward. They all looked relaxed and sneered.

“Let’s go ~”

At this moment, Lu Ming’s figure also moved and he rushed towards the formation, disappearing into it.

this brat has ruined this King’s plan. If you meet him in the formation, kill him for this King!

Heavenly King Nine sabers ‘voice resounded in the ears of more than 100 geniuses of the nine sabers Heavenly King mansion.

Originally, sikong Nan’s plan was going well but was ruined by Lu Ming in the end. He had no choice but to personally come to the nine absolute Heavenly King mansion and use the divine power origin Pearl to carry out his plan. This made him extremely unhappy.

“Heavenly King, don’t worry. I will bring this man’s head to you!”

“That kid is mine!”

The paragons of the nine blades Heavenly King mansion spoke up immediately, their eyes emitting cold killing intent.

“Go!”

Heavenly King Nine sabers waved his hand, and more than a hundred paragons of the residence of Heavenly King Nine sabers flew forward and into the formation.

Lu Ming entered the array and appeared on a mountain peak.

it’s indeed a great formation set up by a Heavenly King. It’s like a world inside the formation!

Lu Ming had an idea. He then randomly chose a direction and flew forward.

The formation covered a vast area, and he had no idea where the ferocious Tiger puppet had run to. He could only fly around and try his luck.

……

Outside the array, in the sky, the huge picture was constantly changing, projecting the image inside the array.

The screen switched between the Tiger puppet and the other elites.

A day passed quickly.

On the first day, many of the heaven’s favorites were searching randomly and trying their luck.

However, after a day, someone approached the Tiger puppet.

“He’s a chosen of the Xu clan!”

Someone exclaimed in a low voice, revealing an excited expression.

These were the Xu family’s experts. From the image, one could see that there were five young men who were very close to the Tiger puppet. These five young men were the Xu family’s heaven’s pride experts.

The Xu family’s experts were naturally happy. As long as the Xu family’s chosen warrior encountered the ferocious Tiger puppet first, killed it, took the divine power Pearl, hid it, and found a place to hide, the divine power Pearl would belong to the Xu family’s chosen warrior after a month.

With the divine power Pearl, the Xu family would have a peerless talent who could awaken the origin secret skill. When the great void Royal sacred Academy held a meeting, he would definitely shine.

One must know that when the great void Royal sacred Academy was held, even the sage Emperor of the great void sacred dynasty would personally appear. As long as one performed well and was recognized by the sage Emperor, one’s future would be boundless.

The people from the other families were also watching nervously, afraid that the Xu family’s Paragon would touch the Tiger puppet.

However, the Xu family’s elite was indeed getting closer and closer to the Tiger puppet.

“I’ve found the Tiger puppet!”

Suddenly, the Xu family’s elite exclaimed in a low voice, his eyes emitting a burning light.

“Kill!”

The five Xu family elites were greatly excited. They immediately rushed out and attacked the ferocious Tiger puppet.

Of the five Xu family’s heaven’s favorites, three were at the first level of the divine King realm. The other two were half-step divine kings and had divine-grade divine power. They were more than enough to kill a first level Divine King Tiger puppet.

The five attacks were aimed at the Tiger puppet.

Roar!

The ferocious Tiger puppet let out a loud roar. It had also discovered the danger, and it immediately fled.
